about_the_game: This game is a highly challenging shooting game that features unique geometric effects, providing players with an unprecedented visual experience. The game screen is dominated by black and white tones, creating a mysterious maze world. Players need to use the ASDW key to move their characters, shoot with the left mouse button, and fight against enemies constantly rushing in from all directions. At the beginning of the game, 100 bullets are provided, and players need to use them carefully and plan their tactics reasonably in order to survive in the complex maze. The design of the overlooking perspective allows players to better grasp the overall situation of the battlefield and make quick responses. The design in the game is extremely realistic, with gunshots, footsteps, and enemies all making people feel like they are in real combat, increasing the tension and excitement of the game.

name: Imminent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2125 / AMD A10-7850K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 / AMD Radeon R7 Graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
